title: Nineteen Eighty
content:
Type treatment. No back history, I was born in 1980, so I like the year. Any comments or suggestions...thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107234617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_treatment_nineteen_post_4865.jpg)
author: JohnMata

comments.content: Cool. I would tint the "80" to a blue color. Abstract :)
